column5: Does anyone know where I can order lake maps for Canada? I would like to order a topo type map or maybe even something designed for fishing. Thanks for the help!OF
Go to www.canadamapsales.com you should find just about anything that you want there are the prices are unbelievable!Happy Fishin'!!

What part of Canada are you interested in? There are quite a few different companies doing fishing maps now. Depending upon the area you want to fish there may be a proper hydrographic chart for the application.
www.fedmaps.com. great place to get any canadian govt. topo. good luck
